subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: The Inquisition: Faith by Force
description: Learn The Inquisition: Faith by Force in one minute.

hook.text: The Church tortured people to save their souls. The Inquisition was Christianity's darkest institution.

buildup.text: Founded in 1184, the Inquisition hunted heretics. The Spanish Inquisition, starting 1478, was especially brutal.

climax.text: The Inquisition proved that unchecked religious authority becomes tyranny. Power corrupts even sacred institutions.

punchline.text: The Inquisition tortured for faith. Power corrupts even sacred causes.

quiz.question: What was the purpose of the Inquisition?
options: Hunting and punishing heretics to enforce religious orthodoxy
